short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes the layout of the Dota2 FandomWiki

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Dota 2 wiki has moved from a Gamepedia wiki to a Fandom Wiki. Previously, the Gamepedia wiki looked awesome. Sadly. the Fandom system does not. It provides a lot of bloat, which ruins the layout of the wiki. This plugin hides part of the Fandom wiki bloat and provides a more pleasant layout for the users of the wiki.
